ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] running speed
ygData.msgSnippet: I find this thread to be kinda stupid. just my 2 cents. ... From: Scott  To:  Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 8:46
ygData.messageBody:
I find this thread to be kinda stupid.

just my 2 cents.

----- Original Message -----
From: Scott <wparrish@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 8:46 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] running speed


> the way i understand it agility has nothing to do with it (as long as your
not
> hurt or encumbered that is) - it's the connection speed and most
importantly
> your computer (including such things as CPU, videocard and RAM) - now for
my
> experiences
>
> i have 4 accounts and 3 computers running off a cable modem - my computer
is a
> celeron 450, 196 ram and voodoo3 - my roommate has a p2 300, 64 ram and a
rage
> pro card - the third computer is a p2 200, 128ram and a pos video card
>
> i'm a level 29 half elf bard - he's a level 31 half elf ranger - while
going
> through the karanas i have to follow him or after a few mins he'll be out
of
> range of my song and i'll leave him in the dust - now we decided to play
around
> with it a little bit and when i log onto my account on his computer i
never lose
> him but when i'm on mine i have to watch him using 3rd person per and i
stop and
> wait when i see my song pulse not hit him - now when i log on with the 3rd
> computer i always have to wait and make sure i don't leave them behind so
i
> usually just play on that computer and have my computer's char follow me
instead
>
> now i know it's not lag as we're all running on the same network and since
we
> switch computers to test a few things out my conclusion is that the only
things
> that make people go faster is a better computer/connection - now i know
this
> might not be enough evidence for everyone but it was enough to convience
both me
> and my roommate but i dunno - maybe we're just weird
>
>
